channel.title: Village creation
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Village creation" - Add to guides

item.title: Re: Village creation
item.content:encoded:
There is no perfect way of doing all this. If you can't figure out this things for yourself than you are not suited to be a Kage.

About attracting villagers. I'll just stick to the random genin that you get. Noone will join your village if they are not a friend of yours. There are bigger villages out there that lack villagers.

My answer to this is no.

item.title: Village creation
item.content:encoded:
I suppose title and summary are self-explanatory.
It could include stuff like what upgrades are priority, how to attract villagers, etc.
